name: Aquamentus EX
author: Alucard648
info: Expanded variant of Aquamentus. Made on request fy SkyFlare
description: Moves like normal enemy, or in circle, faces specific direction, Fires triple fireballs. At low HP speed increases and he fires rays of fire at random positions.
